name: Inventory Tracker for Small Business
description: Only tool you need to manage your inventory for small business effectively in a one-glance view.Do you feel overwhelmed managing your inventory and still feel lost what you need to re-order and what not to?This Notion template is all you need to manage all your inventory like with a simple and easy to use interface setting re-order levels, assigning valuation principles and much more.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certifi
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database
